A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The last Jedi is the worst Star Wars yet. The prequels had some bad acting and dialogue but were still watchable. This movie is filled with plot holes\, ignores details from the force awakens and includes unecessary scenes that only add to the already painful length of the movie. The only quality that is redeeming about this movie is the visuals and music\, beyond that it is not worth watching.
